name: src/esdoc.js
EntityComponentSystem
description: Entity Component System Class

name: components
description: Property where all the components are stored

name: processors
description: Property where all the processors are stored

name: entities
description: Property where all the entites are stored

name: getProcessorNames
description: Gets all Processor names

name: getProcessors
description: Gets all Processors

name: getComponents
description: Gets all Components

name: getEntities
description: Gets all Entities

name: hasProcessor
description: Checks if System has specified Processor

name: hasComponent
description: Checks if System has specified Component

name: hasEntity
description: Checks if System has specified Entity

name: createEntity
description: Compose method to compose a Entity out of components

name: entityHasComponent
description: Checks if Entity has the specified Component

params.name: entity
params.description: the Entity you want to check on

name: removeComponentFromEntity
description: Removes a component from a Entity

params.name: entity
params.description: the Entity you want the component to remove from

name: addComponentToEntity
description: Adds a component to a Entity

params.name: entity
params.description: the Entity you want to add the component on

params.name: component
params.description: The component you want to add

name: addEntity
description: Add Entity to System

params.name: entity
params.description: The Entity you want to register in the system

name: addComponent
description: Add Component to System

params.name: component
params.description: The Component you want to register in the system

name: addProcessor
description: Add Processor to System

params.name: processor
params.description: The Processor you want to register in the system

name: getComponent
description: Get specific component from the system

name: getProcessor
description: Get specific processor from the system

name: getEntity
description: Get specific entity from the system

name: update
description: Update function that updates every entity within the system. This should be called every frame (preferrably inside the game loop)

name: src/example.js
src/index.js
